name: Tectonicalypse
description:
After a particularly emotional breakup, Tectonica the earthquake is feeling a little unstable. What better way to blow off some steam then to BRING THE FEEBLY CONSTRUCTED BUILDINGS OF THOSE INSIGNIFICANT ANTS TO THE GROUND!

should be fun :)

- Use the mouse to move.

- Use the mouse left button, or X or Z on your keyboard unleash your shake to bring down buildings.

- Shaking will use up your rings, so be sure to collect those shiny tremors to refuel them.

- Take down all the buildings, or just watch them grow and multiply. Its really up to you

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 49 using the wonderful TIC-80, written in Fennel
